item.title: Sean O'Brien on "What are some useful tools for creating timelines?"
item.dc:creator: Sean O'Brien
item.description: I want to give my students a range of options for tools that will help construct detailed timelines online and/or in printable documents.

item.title: dot.porter on "Open-source historical GIS tools"
item.dc:creator: dot.porter
item.description: Do you know of any existing open-source tools that can handle the layered visualization of historic data on maps and the visualization of that data over time? Like, extract data out of a relational database and layered to create different visualizations. Or something like this?
